title: If there is no data for series, it should display a friendly error message.
OB: When the Preview feature is used with no data for a series, it doesn't provide a friendly error message.
EB: When the Preview feature is used with no data for a series, it should display a friendly error message to remind the user.
SR:
1. Open the Preview feature.
2. Load a series with no data.
3. Verify if a friendly error message is displayed.
